channel.title: Experienced coder, please help me
channel.description:
Time and time again I've tried to make a Runescape private server, I've tried 100s of clients and sources that never work. I know barely any Java and when I do get a decent source and client I can never put into a web-client or .java client. I know if you help me create the server you gain nothing from it; if you can make me a server you can obviously make your own so why would you need Co-owner rank etc. but I've been trying to do this for ages and It is really stressful and I know a few people on here could whip up a decent server in 5 minutes if they wanted to.
If anyone kind enough is willing to help me then add my skype: Joshb1rd or message me on here.

item.title: Experienced coder, please help me
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

ohokay:

Downloads section, get a base and work on it. I don’t think anyone could whip up a server in 5 minutes…

Inb4fanz

Read full topic

item.title: Experienced coder, please help me
item.dc:creator: @imstrength imstrength
item.description:
@imstrength wrote:

it would be a .jar client. not a .ajava and also if anyone here made a server in 5 minutes…it would be a leech so it would be very very terrible.

anyways, i would get you as far as having a server that is online…it would be a leech but you can code it yourself…i could also make you a .jar client…

if you want more info add my skype…

dustin.petit

Read full topic
